stopwords = set(STOPWORDS)

def show_wordcloud(data, title = None):
    wordcloud = WordCloud(
        background_color='Black',
        stopwords=stopwords,
        max_words=50,
        max_font_size=40, 
        scale=5,
        random_state=1
    ).generate(str(data))

    fig = plt.figure(1, figsize=(15,15))
    plt.axis('off')
    if title: 
        fig.suptitle(title, fontsize=20)
        fig.subplots_adjust(top=2.3)

    plt.imshow(wordcloud)
    plt.show()
